魟鱼 [ hóng yú ]: skate (cartilaginous fish belonging to the family Rajidae); stingray
Freq: 6625

魟字的基本解释

魟
hóng
〔魟鱼〕身体扁平，略呈圆形或菱形，软骨无鳞，胸鳍发达，如蝶展翅，尾呈鞭状，有毒刺。生活在海底。种类很多，常见的有尖嘴魟、赤魟、燕魟等。

魟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hóng］
［《廣韻》户公切，平東，匣。］
［《廣韻》呼東切，平東，曉。］
(1)鱼名。海底生活的鰩类鱼。体扁平，略呈圆形或方形。尾常呈鞭状，有毒刺。种类颇多，有黄魟、黑魟等。中国沿海均产。
(2)淡水鰩鱼。中国近年所发现的龙州鯆鱼即此鱼，与海产的赤魟同种而为淡水鰩。按，《广韵·平東》：“魟，河魚似鼈。”
[②]［gōng］
［《廣韻》古紅切，平東，見。］
指赤尾白鱼。

魟字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　魟； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1465第13
【廣韻】古紅切【集韻】沽紅切，?音公。䰸或作魟。䱑魟，江蟲，形似蟹，可食。又【集韻】古雙切，音江。義同。又【廣韻】戸公切【集韻】胡公切，?音洪。白魚。【類篇】白魟，魚名。一曰魚肥。○按《酉陽雜俎》：黃魟魚，色黃無鱗頭尖，身似槲葉，口在頷下，眼後有耳，竅通於腦，尾長一尺，末三刺甚毒。據此說，魟有黃白二種，《類篇》特舉白者言之耳。又【廣韻】呼東切【集韻】呼公切，?音烘。河魚似?。【六書故】海魚，無鱗，狀如蝙蝠，大者如車輪。

魟字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
魟字的起名意思

鱼名,泛指属于魟科。

Stingray
Basic explanation of words
Stingray
hóng
[Stingray] The body is flat, slightly round or diamond, with no scales in cartilage, and well-developed pectoral fins, like a butterfly's wings, with a whip-like tail and poisonous spines. Live on the bottom of the sea. There are many types, the common ones are the sharp-billed stingray, the red stingray, and the swallow stingray.
Stingray
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hóng］
["Guangyun" Hu Gongqie, Pingdong, Xie. ]
["Guangyun" Hu Dongqie, Pingdong, Xiao. ]
(1) The name of the fish. Rays living under the sea. The body is flat, slightly round or square. The tail is often whip-shaped with poisonous spines. There are many species, including yellow and black rays. Both are produced along the coast of China.
(2) Freshwater rays. The Longzhou ray discovered in China in recent years is this fish. It is the same species as the marine red stingray and is a freshwater ray. Press, "Guangyun·Pingdong": "A stingray, a river fish is like a turtle."
[②]［gōng］
["Guangyun" Gu Hongqi, Pingdong, see. ]
Refers to red tail white fish.
Stingray
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　魟; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1465 13
[Guang Yun] ancient red cut [Ji Yun] Gu Hong cut,? Yin Gong.䰸 or make stingray. Yunying, river worm, shaped like a crab, edible. Also 【Jiyun】Ancient double cut, Yinjiang. The same meaning. And [Guang Yun] Gong Gong cut [Ji Yun] Hu Gong cut,? Yin Hong. whitefish. 【Classes】White ray, fish name. One said fish fat. ○According to "Youyang Miscellaneous Cu": Yellow stingray, yellow in color, without scales, head, body like mistleaf, mouth under the jaw, ears behind the eyes, the orifice communicates with the brain, the tail is one foot long, and the last three thorns are very poisonous. According to this, there are two kinds of stingrays, yellow and white, and the "Lei Pian" specializes in the ear of the white person. [Guang Yun] Hu Dongqie [Ji Yun] Hugong cut, sound bake. Like a river fish? [Six Books] Marine fish, without scales, resemble bats, and larger ones are like wheels.
